body.name: BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape, 39.3 Feet, 2-Count Pack of white Correction Tape, Fast, Clean and Easy to Use Tear-Resistant Tape Office or School Supplies
features: One 2-count pack of BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape, a tear-resistant, film-based correction tape with a tape dispenser offering maximum comfort and control
Instantly write or type your corrections with this white correction tape, which requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip
Clear correction tape dispenser lets you see exactly how much tape remains and the self-winding wheel lets you rewind the tape if it becomes loose
Each tape dispenser contains 39.3 feet of white correction tape to offer a long-lasting option for school or office supplies
Suitable for righties and lefties, these BIC Wite-Out Brand tapes offer a wide variety of use amongst students and employees for their documents and assignments
Cartridge colors may vary, same great wite out tape
body.description: Make fast, easy and precise corrections on even the toughest errors with BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape. This tear-resistant, film-based BIC Wite-Out Brand Correction Tape comes in a tape dispenser that offers maximum comfort and control, so you can easily and accurately correct mistakes. The tear resistance offers tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last. The Wite-Out Brand tape requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip, so you can instantly write or type your corrections over it. A translucent body lets you see exactly how much BIC correction tape remains and a self-winding wheel lets you easily rewind the correction tape should it become loose. One pack contains 2 tape dispensers, each containing 39.3 feet of white correction tape. If you’re looking for reliable office or school supplies for lefties and righties, look no further than this Wite-Out Brand correction tape. From America’s No. 1 correction brand*, choose BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape for a high-quality, safe and affordable product you can trust. *Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service and Commercial Tracking Service, U.S., based on actual unit sales; 12ME June 2022 combined.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fix Mistakes Fast with BIC Wite Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape Instant, Tidy Corrections BIC Wite-Out Brand correction tape applies dry, allowing you to quickly write over and fix mistakes without the mess or waiting time of a correction fluid. Offering greater strength than paper-based tape, this film-based tape is more tear resistant to create tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last. Easy to Apply Dispensing the tape in a controlled, comfortable fashion is easy: simply position the tip flat on the area to be corrected, press down firmly, and gently move from left to right. If tape becomes loose, press tip of tape firmly on paper, make slow motion towards the right, and repeat until tape rewinds. Translucent Dispenser The translucent dispenser allows you to see at a glance how much tape is remaining. Ideal for on-the-go corrections, each compact tape dispenser contains 39.3 feet of correction tape, offering long-lasting use without sacrificing portability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product to hide mistakes
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Sometimes difficult to write on but with the right pen you can.Love this tape wish it could fix bigger mistakes - haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easily spreads across paper. Dries very fast. Works well. Not messy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly I was shocked at how Excellent these are!
reviews.reviewText: I don't have a need for very much of this type of product, but I'm astonished at how well these worked vs what I had been using. It's SO much easier to use & the tape covers flawlessly & doesn't break.Fits in my hand perfectly, goes on easily with little effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not that durable but good white-out
reviews.reviewText: I don't like that it breaks very easily but besides that it works very well and I would definitely recommend for those who use pens a lot and make mistakes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the better inventions of the modern days
reviews.reviewText: I will stand on that island alone if I need to. But over the last, however, many years, the role on whiteout has been one of the more convenient inventions in my life. I do not miss the days of stinky white out that you can’t get over your writing evenly. Do I wish that the white out roller was more sturdy in the little plastic ribbon didn’t want to go off balance so often? absolutely! But as a product of the 80s, I will tell you that we’ve come along way and I do not miss the past options. Great price great product. Hopefully you’ve used it. It’s been around a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have saved me from one too many errors!
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend. The correction tape flows well and removes errors as needed. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this product it's better than the liquid white out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Roughly half of the applicators in each package will prove to be defective
reviews.reviewText: Some are no good right out of the box, with no tape threaded where it should be. Others will work for a while, before the tape gets off track and cannot be put right, or just breaks and cannot be retrieved. There is always tape left in the applicator when this happens. When they work, they are great, but the percentage of failure makes these a poor bet.I once tried utilize the BIC guarantee refund/replacement, but after lodging a complaint online they will want you to package up and mail back the bad ones, along with a receipt and original packaging (or some such--it's been a while since my last failed effort). Since I generally buy these when I think of it or run out, and they don't get used right away, these hurdles and the cost of postage effectively negate the guarantee.So, BIC is off my dance card and I'm looking for another, more reliable, brand.
Never disappoints..well, very rarely the spool will come apart though. Worth the money
White out works without having to wait for it to dry
Erased many of my mistakes... though not all of them.
